title: Why an increase in T increases rate of reaction

content.prompt: Which of the following statements best explains why an increase in temperature of 5-10 Celsius degrees can substantially increase the rate of a chemical reaction?

choices.label: The activation energy for the reaction is lowered.
The number of effective collisions between reactant particles is increased.
The rate of the reverse reaction is increased.

skill.text: 6.E: Provide reasoning to justify a claim using connections between particulate and macroscopic scales or levels.
